definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
medium/intermediary/matchmaker/go-between/abbr. for 媒體|媒体[mei2 ti3], media, esp. news media

pinyin: Shang4 hai3 Wen2 guang3 Xin1 wen2 Chuan2 mei2 Ji2 tuan2
containing_words.word: 上海文广新闻传媒集团

definition: Communication University of China (CUC), the highest institute of radio, film and television education in China
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Chuan2 mei2 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: The case was brought by Mercis Media, Bruna's copyright management firm.
sentences.chinese: 本案原告是米菲的版权拥有者Mercis传媒公司。

sentences.english: But the commercial media... it's horrible.
sentences.chinese: 但商业传媒就有点糟糕了。

sentences.english: Following that, the two heads of state jointly met with journalists from the media of China, Chile and other countries.
sentences.chinese: 随后两国元首共同会见了中智两国和国际传媒记者。

sentences.english: Do you think the news media in Hong Kong have any scruple about criticizing the XX Government?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得香港新闻传媒系批评XX政府既时候有冇顾忌？

sentences.english: The cost of media is an important but troublesome consideration.
sentences.chinese: 宣传媒体的开支是件非常重要而又很麻烦的事。

sentences.english: Focus Media would retain a rump ad business.
sentences.chinese: 分众传媒将保持一小部分广告业务。

sentences.english: The media industry is increasingly hoping it stays that way.
sentences.chinese: 传媒业正日益盼望保持这一势头。

sentences.english: Virgin Media has started trials to deliver fibre-optic high-speed broadband over telegraph poles.
sentences.chinese: 维珍传媒已开始试验使用电线杆架设高速光纤宽带。

sentences.english: The abundance of unhealthy media portrayals could have clinical consequences.
sentences.chinese: 大量的不健康传媒形象会产生临床后果。

sentences.english: The extra edition is a kind of the valuable paper media.
sentences.chinese: 号外是一种颇有价值的纸质传媒。

sentences.english: Radio broadcasting is the only non-visual medium in the world.
sentences.chinese: 广播是当今世界上惟一的非视觉传媒。

sentences.english: Through no fault of his own, he happens to be born into an era where the mass media is king.
sentences.chinese: 他刚好出生在大众传媒为王的年代，这不能怪他。

sentences.english: Moneyweek is affiliated with Nanfang Daily Media Group and an important member of 21st Century Media.
sentences.chinese: 隶属于南方报业传媒集团，为21世纪报系重要成员。

sentences.english: Sina said it would issue 47m new ordinary shares to Focus Media shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 新浪表示，将向分众传媒股东增发4700万普通股。

sentences.english: The police and prosecutors have worked as the authorities' hitmen， trying to keep the meida from reporting government corruption.
sentences.chinese: 警方和检控官都护着政府，阻挠传媒报导政府贪污。

sentences.english: This is indicating, outdoors medium is become in petrifaction its new profit point of growth.
sentences.chinese: 这标志着，户外传媒成为中石化其新的利润增长点。

definition: to produce an item/output/items that are produced
Sohu, Chinese web portal and online media company
